description: Returns the details for the specified incident record.

parameters.name: arn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the incident record.

nested_items.name: incidentRecord
nested_items.description: Details the structure of the incident record.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the incident record.

nested_items.name: automationExecutions
nested_items.description: The runbook, or automation document, that's run at the beginning of the incident.

nested_items.name: ssmExecutionArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the automation process.

nested_items.name: chatChannel
nested_items.description: The chat channel used for collaboration during an incident.

nested_items.name: chatbotSns
nested_items.description: The Amazon SNS targets that Chatbot uses to notify the chat channel of updates to an incident. You can also make updates to the incident through the chat channel by using the Amazon SNS topics.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp for when Incident Manager created the incident record.

nested_items.name: dedupeString
nested_items.description: The string Incident Manager uses to prevent duplicate incidents from being created by the same incident in the same account.

nested_items.name: impact
nested_items.description: The impact of the incident on customers and applications.
1 - Critical.
2 - High.
3 - Medium.
4 - Low.
5 - No Impact.

nested_items.name: incidentRecordSource
nested_items.description: Details about the action that started the incident.

nested_items.name: createdBy
nested_items.description: The principal that started the incident.

nested_items.name: invokedBy
nested_items.description: The service principal that assumed the role specified in createdBy. If no service principal assumed the role this will be left blank.

nested_items.name: resourceArn
nested_items.description: The resource that caused the incident to be created.

nested_items.name: source
nested_items.description: The service that started the incident. This can be manually created from Incident Manager, automatically created using an Amazon CloudWatch alarm, or Amazon EventBridge event.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedBy
nested_items.description: Who modified the incident most recently.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp for when the incident was most recently modified.

nested_items.name: notificationTargets
nested_items.description: The Amazon SNS targets that are notified when updates are made to an incident.

nested_items.name: snsTopicArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the SNS topic.

nested_items.name: resolvedTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp for when the incident was resolved. This appears as a timeline event.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of the incident.

nested_items.name: summary
nested_items.description: The summary of the incident. The summary is a brief synopsis of what occurred, what's currently happening, and context of the incident.

nested_items.name: title
nested_items.description: The title of the incident.
